subject: Rx Axis Issue
description_text:
I recently received brand new Simsonn Pro X Ultra pedals, however the Rx axis constantly flickers. Even unplugging all pedals from the little Simsonn box and plugging the little box directly to the computer did not help. Do I have a defective product?

 Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Cole, In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.

Thank you so much for the fast response! It worked! Have a great day!
